Introduction

Anton Lee, also known as Anton, is a South Korean-American singer under SM Entertainment. He is the maknae of the boy group RIIZE, which debuted on September 4, 2023, with their first single album "Get a Guitar."

Reports emerged on July 18, 2023, suggesting that Anton would make his debut in SM Entertainment's new boy group. However, SM Entertainment neither confirmed nor denied the reports, stating that further details about the new boy group would be released on August 1, 2023. On August 1, 2023, his participation in the new boy group, RIIZE, was officially confirmed by SM Entertainment. He was introduced as a member with a new talent in composition and a unique musical sense.
